tool_description: This API enables you to search for real-time hotel, flight, rental car, and taxi prices, as well as attractions. To create a travel website like Booking.com, Booking, Skyscanner, AirBnb, TripAdvisor, and Agaoda. On a real-time basis, this API reproduces public data.

function.name: get_currency
function.description: Get the list of currencies that are available.

function.name: get_exchange_rates
function.description: Obtain a list of exchange rates for all currencies utilizing the base currency.

query.description: Names of locations, apartment, address, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

function.name: test_api
function.description: To check if server is up and running

query.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

dest_id.description: dest_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

search_type.description: search_type can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in hotel collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

categories_filter.description:
categories_filter can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getFilter(Get Filter) endpoint in Hotels collection.
Note: For the initial request, leave it blank.

languagecode.description: To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages ) endpoint in Meta collection.

dest_id.description: dest_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

temperature_unit.description:

c = Celsius

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

longitude.description: Longitude of the searched location. longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

radius.description:
The hotels that are within the radius. The radius is measured in kilometers.
Default is set to 100.
Range is between 10 to 500.

function.name: search_flight_location
function.description: Find airports by their location, address, state, country, etc.

query.description: Names of airport, locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

languagecode.description: To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages ) endpoint in Meta collection.

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

departDate.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
{
'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
'date': '2024-05-25'
},
…
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

token.description: token can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchFlights(Search Flights) or api/v1/flights/searchFlightsMultiStops(Search Flights Multi Stops) endpoints in Flights collection as token.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

departDate.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
{
'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
'date': '2024-05-25'
},
…
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

offerToken.description: offerToken can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchFlights(Search Flights) or api/v1/flights/searchFlightsMultiStops(Search Flights Multi Stops) endpoints in Flights collection as offerToken.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

function.name: search_car_location
function.description: Find locations by searching for their name, address, city, state, country, etc.

query.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

languagecode.description: To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages ) endpoint in Meta collection.

pick_up_latitude.description: The pick up location's latitude. pick_up_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object.

pick_up_longitude.description: The pick up location's longitude. pick_up_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object.

drop_off_latitude.description: The drop off location's latitude. drop_off_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object.

drop_off_longitude.description: The drop off location's longitude. drop_off_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object.

pick_up_time.description:
Pick up time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

drop_off_time.description:
Drop off time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

driver_age.description:
The driver's age. The default value is set to 30.
Note: The driver age must be in the range of 20 to 65 years.

languagecode.description: To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages ) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

vehicle_id.description: Vehicle ID. vehicle_id can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as vehicle_id inside search_results object.

search_key.description: search_key can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals(Search Car Rentals) endpoint in Car Rental collection as search_key.
